law.text: Any group policy, group plan, or group contract issued in this state by a health maintenance organization shall offer the master policyholder the option to purchase in new contracts the minimum benefits for treatment of alcoholism as specified in KRS 304.18-130 to 304.18-170.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 8, effective January 1, 1979.
